00035 int Player::start()
00036 {
00037    // Open the file
00038    BinaryDataReader data;
00039    SysErrIf( data.open(cfg_.file) != 0 );
00040    
00041    // Connect with the client (or server);
00042    Socket *pS;
00043    ErrIf( (pS=connect()) == 0 );
00044    boost::scoped_ptr<Socket> sock(pS);
00045    
00046    // Playback the data into the socket
00047    playback( pS, data );
00048    
00049    return 0;
00050 }

00062 Socket* Player::connect()
00063 {
00064    Socket *sock = new TCPSocket("Player");
00065    IPAddress ip( cfg_.host.c_str(), cfg_.port.c_str() );
00066 
00067    if ( cfg_.type == Config::CLIENT ) {
00068       sock->connectTo(ip);
00069    }
00070    else {
00071       sock->listenOn(ip);
00072       Socket* client = sock->accept("Cli");
00073       sock->close();
00074       delete sock;
00075       return client;
00076    }
00077    return sock;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00090 int Player::playback( Socket* pS, BinaryDataReader& data )
00091 {
00092    TransferType buf_T = (cfg_.type == Config::CLIENT)?R_to_L:L_to_R;
00093    while ( pS->good() && data.good() && ! data.eof() ) {
00094       Buffer* pB;
00095       if ((pB = data.getNext()) != 0 ) {
00096          if ( pB->type == buf_T ) {
00097             // Got a buffer we're supposed to send...
00098             pS->send( *pB );
00099          }
00100          else {
00101             // Got a buffer we're supposed to recieve! See what we get?
00102             Buffer* pBGot = pS->recv();
00103             if ( pBGot->len != pB->len ) {
00104                std::cerr << "Recieved a message of unmatching length: got=" << pBGot->len
00105                          << " bytes, expected=" << pB->len << " bytes.\n";
00106             }
00107             delete pBGot;
00108          }  
00109          delete pB;
00110       }
00111    }
00112    return (pS->good() && data.eof())?0:-1;
00113 }
